titlePart.text: PUMPS FOR LIQUIDS OR ELASTIC FLUIDS
titlePart.entryReference: charging or scavenging combustion engines by pumps

noteParagraph.text: Combinations of positive-displacement and non-positive-displacement pumps are to be found in the following sub-classes: as a general sub-class for pumps; , in respect of matter peculiar to these sub-classes.

titlePart.entryReference: machines for liquids, or pumps, of rotary-piston or oscillating-piston type
pumping of fluid by direct contact of another fluid or by using inertia of fluid to be pumped
gearings for interconverting rotary motion and reciprocating motion in general

noteParagraph.text: Attention is drawn to the notes preceding class , especially as regards the definitions of "machines", "pumps", and 'positive-displacement".
In this sub-class, the term "piston" also covers a plunger.
